title: 48: Bachelorette Recap: Episode 6 (“STAY IN YOUR FREAKING LANE”)
itunes:title: 48: Bachelorette Recap: Episode 6 (“STAY IN YOUR FREAKING LANE”)
description:
(WARNING: Some announced Bachelor in Paradise cast mates are discussed in the last few minutes!) Another week full of Luke P. and we are starting to think he is actually secretly the Bachelorette. The Broads chat the power of Hannah Brown, the series of scary Luke P. sequences, how everyone is making Hannah “psycho”, future paradise players, and we recap the mid-season recap?? And much more! 
Chatty Broads is recorded and produced at @theblueroommedia www.theblueroommedia.com (http://www.theblueroommedia.com/)

*** FAB FIT FUN: Go to  www.FABFITFUN.com (http://www.fabfitfun.com/) and use the code "CHATTY" so you can save $10 off your first box #fabfitfunpartner
